description: The attacker might use LOLBAS nltest.exe for discovery of domain controllers, domain trusts, parent domain and the current user permissions. Author: Arun Chauhan. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: rare legitimate use by an administrator
name: Correct Execution of Nltest.exe
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4689" AND winlog.event_data.ProcessName:*nltest.exe AND winlog.event_data.Status:"0x0")
